items.sentence: The problem is that Tom doesn\'t pay his bills on time.
The reasons Tom gave for doing that weren\'t very good.
Your feet are swollen because your shoes are too small.
What makes you think that Tom is planning on resigning?
When I was young, I used to often watch baseball games.
Where can I hide that no one would think of finding me?
Tom didn\'t really know why he was supposed to do that.
Tom didn\'t remember whether the room was empty or not.
Tom didn\'t seem to be as annoyed as Mary seemed to be.
Tom doesn\'t know for certain who Mary\'s boyfriend is.
Tom and three of his friends went camping last weekend.
Tom asked Mary if she enjoyed reading murder mysteries.
Tom blamed Mary for the accident that killed their son.
Tom wanted to hug Mary, but he knew that he shouldn\'t.
A tree has fallen across Park Street, blocking traffic.
A young boy in a wheelchair asked Tom what time it was.
Be careful not to drink too much coffee in the evening.
She had changed so much that I couldn\'t recognize her.
She told him a joke, but he didn\'t think it was funny.
Tom doesn\'t know whether Mary will agree to go or not.
